m_szDocTitle: World's first fuel-cell car-sharing program to launch in Germany

Close 144 views May 9, 2016 Hyundai ix35 Fuel Cell for BeeZero car-sharing service Enlarge Photo Car-sharing services have become increasingly popular over the past few years, and many of them operate fleets of battery-electric cars.
